text: Barreirashttps://www.google.pt/maps/@39.2668927,-9.0550181,349m/data=!3m1!1e3 is a small Portuguese village located in Peral, Cadaval, in the Lisbon district. Its population is around 110 inhabitants, all over the village, but its center has just around 60. == References == Category:Villages in Portugal Category:Cadaval
title: Barreiras (Cadaval)
